testimonials.quote: Holistic nutrition finally makes sense! Sarah's teaching style is amazing.
testimonials.name: Amanda L.

testimonials.quote: I passed on my first try. The exam covered exactly what was taught.
testimonials.name: Nicole T.

questions.question: What does holistic nutrition primarily focus on?

options.text: Addressing the root causes of health issues through whole-person nutrition, considering body, mind, and lifestyle
Diagnosing nutritional deficiencies in a lab

questions.question: As a certified holistic nutrition specialist, your role is to:

options.text: Diagnose medical conditions and prescribe diets
Educate and support clients on personalized nutrition and lifestyle changes
Order blood tests and interpret lab results
Replace the client's doctor or dietitian

questions.question: In the D.E.P.T.H. Method, what does the "D" stand for?
What is the Warm Market Strategy for finding your first holistic nutrition clients?

options.text: List 20 people you know who have mentioned nutrition or health struggles

questions.question: What is the recommended starter package price for new holistic nutrition coaches?

options.text: Free sessions until you feel confident
